languages.text: "Раньше я не страшилась забвения, зная, что душа моя однажды сольется с Контуром бесконечности Крудараха, встретится с предками. Но теперь... я позорно страшусь каждого предстоящего боя".

"I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."
languages.original_text: "Раньше я не страшилась забвения, зная, что душа моя однажды сольется с Контуром бесконечности Крудараха, встретится с предками. Но теперь... я позорно страшусь каждого предстоящего боя".

traits.locale_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would someday become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

"I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would someday become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

"I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

languages.text: “我以前并不害怕死亡，因为我很清楚，总有一天，我的灵魂会与克鲁达拉赫的永恒回路融为一体，加入我的祖先之中。可现在……我害怕接下来面对的每场战斗，这令我羞愧不已。”
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: “我以前并不害怕死亡，因为我很清楚，总有一天，我的灵魂会与克鲁达拉赫的永恒回路融为一体，加入我的祖先之中。可现在……我害怕接下来面对的每场战斗，这令我羞愧不已。”

languages.text: 「以前は忘却など恐れていなかった。いつか我の魂はクルダラの無限回路となり、父祖の元へ行くということがわかっていたから。だが、今では…今では立ち向かうべき全ての戦いを、不名誉なまでに恐れている」
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: 「以前は忘却など恐れていなかった。いつか我の魂はクルダラの無限回路となり、父祖の元へ行くということがわかっていたから。だが、今では…今では立ち向かうべき全ての戦いを、不名誉なまでに恐れている」

languages.text: « Je ne craignais pas le néant avant, car je savais qu'un jour, mon âme ne ferait plus qu'un avec le Circuit d'Infinité de Crudarach et qu'elle rejoindrait mes ancêtres. Mais à présent... à présent, j'ai honteusement peur de livrer chaque bataille. »
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne craignais pas le néant avant, car je savais qu'un jour, mon âme ne ferait plus qu'un avec le Circuit d'Infinité de Crudarach et qu'elle rejoindrait mes ancêtres. Mais à présent... à présent, j'ai honteusement peur de livrer chaque bataille. »

languages.text: «Antes no temía al olvido, pues sabía que mi alma acabaría formando parte del Circuito Infinito de Crudarach y uniéndose a mis ancestros. Pero ahora... me avergüenza admitir que siento temor cada vez que voy a la batalla».
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: «Antes no temía al olvido, pues sabía que mi alma acabaría formando parte del Circuito Infinito de Crudarach y uniéndose a mis ancestros. Pero ahora... me avergüenza admitir que siento temor cada vez que voy a la batalla».

languages.text: "Früher hatte ich keine Angst davor, vergessen zu werden, denn ich wusste, dass meine Seele eines Tages eins wird mit der Unendlichkeitsmatrix von Crudarach und ich dann bei meinen Ahnen bin. Aber jetzt ... jetzt habe ich schändliche Angst vor jedem Kampf, den ich austragen muss."
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: "Früher hatte ich keine Angst davor, vergessen zu werden, denn ich wusste, dass meine Seele eines Tages eins wird mit der Unendlichkeitsmatrix von Crudarach und ich dann bei meinen Ahnen bin. Aber jetzt ... jetzt habe ich schändliche Angst vor jedem Kampf, den ich austragen muss."

languages.text: "Ruhumun bir gün Crudarach'ın Ebedî Devresi'yle bir olacağını ve atalarıma kavuşacağını bildiğim için felaketten korkmazdım. Fakat artık... Artık karşılaştığım her savaştan utanç içinde korkuyorum."
languages.original_text: "I did not fear oblivion before, knowing that my soul would one day become one with the Infinity Circuit of Crudarach and join my ancestors. But now... now I am shamefully afraid of every battle I have to face."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhumun bir gün Crudarach'ın Ebedî Devre'siyle bir olacağını ve atalarıma kavuşacağını bildiğim için felaketten korkmazdım. Fakat artık... Artık karşılaştığım her savaştan utanç içinde korkuyorum."
